description:
Black suddenly appears from a mysterious portal. Goku sees this as an opportunity to test his look-alike’s power firsthand. But while the battle rages on, Black glances at the time machine with a sinister look in his eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku gegen Black! – Der Weg zur verschlossenen Zukunft!
Goku vs Black! The Closed Path to the Future
Gokuu tai Black! Tozasareta Mirai e no Michi
悟空VS[たい]ブラック! 閉ざされた未来への道
